attributes.action: Allow Aysha Kings parents to take their son for treatment and a full investigation into their treatment by the Doctors involved.
attributes.additional_details: I think I can speak for many people. If you take a look at this families video, these are good loving parents and do not deserve to be arrested. This child was in good hands and has been needlessly taken from his parents and his parents hunted down and arrested like criminals. They had every right to question their childs treatment without being threatened by the hospital staff. They need to be able to give their child the treatment that may help him and a full investigation on their treatment by the staff and police should be launched.

rejection.details: Please resubmit your petition stating your full name as well as your email address.  There are already petitions on the system regarding this issue to please also ensure you are not duplicating an existing petition.
